meanings.definition: A type of fabric used for making trousers.
meanings.sent1: The tailor used ratteens to sew a new pair of trousers.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pair of trousers made from ratteens at the store.
meanings.sent3: The ratteens fabric was so soft that the trousers felt like pajamas.
meanings.sent4: Her love for ratteens trousers was as strong as her love for chocolate.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant color of the ratteens fabric made the trousers stand out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A style of trousers made from ratteens fabric.
meanings.sent1: His favorite outfit included ratteens trousers paired with a white shirt.
meanings.sent2: The fashion designer showcased a collection of ratteens trousers at the event.
meanings.sent3: Wearing ratteens trousers made him feel like a fashion model.
meanings.sent4: The ratteens trousers hugged her legs like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The durability of ratteens fabric ensured the trousers lasted for years.

meanings.definition: To make trousers from ratteens fabric.
meanings.sent1: She decided to ratteens a new pair of trousers for the upcoming party.
meanings.sent2: The tailor carefully ratteens the fabric to create a perfect fit.
meanings.sent3: Ratteening trousers became her favorite hobby during the weekends.
meanings.sent4: He ratteens the ratteens fabric with precision and skill.
meanings.sent5: The art of ratteening trousers required patience and attention to detail.
